title: This one should be easy but it's doing my head in
content:
It's the font 'Temple Street'...any ideas?

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [teple logo copy.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823014239/http:/typophile.com/files/teple%20logo%20copy.jpg) | 28.07 KB |
author: laganlorelei

comments.content: Providing [the best sample you could find](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823014239/http:/www.irishtriathlon.com/wp-content/uploads/2010/09/TempleLogo.jpg) is always appreciated :) Anyway, [Impress](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823014239/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/impress) or [Fimotype Prima](http://web.archive.org/web/20140823014239/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/filmotype/prima) should do the job.
Thanks so much, you saved me hours there!
